articles.author: Maggie Shiltagh
articles.title: Anti-American Sentiment Rises in Europe as Trump Fuels Anger - Bloomberg
articles.description: Rising anti-American sentiment in Europe as President Donald Trump’s policies ruffle feathers is ushering in a shift in consumer behavior, not least in attitudes toward American goods.
articles.content:

articles.title: Crowds Swarm Tesla Showrooms Nationwide to Protest Elon Musk - Bloomberg
articles.description: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — Protesters against billionaire Elon Musk’s purge of the U.S. government under President Donald Trump demonstrated outside Tesla dealerships throughout the U.S. and in some cities in Europe on Saturday in the latest attempt to dent the for…
